parse: Conjunction
str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Noun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an obsolete primary of the same meaning; to show.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Preposition
str2: Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.

parse: Noun - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.

str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.

str2: A prolonged form of an obsolete primary of the same meaning; to show.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Article - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Preposition
str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
